description.zh-cn: 中国古代最大的类书，由明成祖朱棣下令编纂，收录了明初之前各种学科的文献资料。
description.en: The largest leishu (a type of reference book) in ancient China, commissioned by the Yongle Emperor of the Ming dynasty. It collected a vast amount of literature and knowledge from before the early Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝学者、官员，《永乐大典》首任主编。
description.en: A Ming dynasty scholar and official, the first chief editor of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明朝政治家、高僧，在《永乐大典》重修时担任监修。
description.en: A Ming dynasty politician and Buddhist monk who served as a supervisor for the revision of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明朝礼部尚书，在《永乐大典》重修时担任监修。
description.en: Minister of Rites of the Ming dynasty who served as a supervisor for the revision of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，年号永乐。他下令编纂《永乐大典》。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming dynasty, known as the Yongle Emperor. He commissioned the compilation of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国皇帝，解缙曾向其提议编写类书。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming dynasty, to whom Xie Jin once proposed the compilation of a leishu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝，年号嘉靖。他下令重录《永乐大典》以制作副本。
description.en: The 12th emperor of the Ming dynasty, known as the Jiajing Emperor. He ordered the creation of a duplicate manuscript copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，被任命为《永乐大典》重录工作的总校官。
description.en: A Ming dynasty official appointed as the general proofreader for the project to create a duplicate copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官员，被任命为《永乐大典》重录工作的总校官。
description.en: A Ming dynasty official appointed as the general proofreader for the project to create a duplicate copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明末农民起义领袖，其军队被认为是焚毁《永乐大典》正本的可能原因之一。
description.en: A leader of a peasant rebellion at the end of the Ming dynasty, whose army is considered a possible cause for the destruction of the original manuscript of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 清末官员，曾从翰林院盗走百余册《永乐大典》。
description.en: An official in the late Qing dynasty who stole over a hundred volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia from the Hanlin Academy.

description.zh-cn: 清末的一支军队，在1900年焚烧翰林院，导致《永乐大典》部分被毁或散佚。
description.en: An army unit in the late Qing dynasty that burned down the Hanlin Academy in 1900, causing parts of the Yongle Encyclopedia to be destroyed or scattered.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的学术机构和官僚储备机构，曾长期收藏《永乐大典》副本。
description.en: An academic and administrative institution in imperial China, which stored the duplicate manuscript of the Yongle Encyclopedia for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 清朝乾隆年间编修的中国历史上规模最大的丛书，其编纂过程中从《永乐大典》中辑佚了大量古籍。
description.en: The largest collection of books in Chinese history, compiled during the Qianlong era of the Qing dynasty. A significant number of lost ancient books were recovered from the Yongle Encyclopedia for its compilation.

description.zh-cn: 清朝皇帝，下令开四库馆并从《永乐大典》中辑佚。
description.en: An emperor of the Qing dynasty who ordered the establishment of the Siku Quanshu project and the recovery of lost texts from the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 清朝安徽学政，上书提议从《永乐大典》中辑佚以编纂《四库全书》。
description.en: The Education Commissioner of Anhui during the Qing dynasty, who proposed recovering lost texts from the Yongle Encyclopedia for the compilation of the Siku Quanshu.

en: Old History of the Five Dynasties

description.zh-cn: 一部关于五代十国历史的史书，原书已佚，后由清代学者从《永乐大典》中辑出。
description.en: A historical text about the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period. The original was lost and later reconstructed by Qing scholars from the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 明朝官方颁布的韵书，《永乐大典》以此书作为编排韵目。
description.en: The official rime dictionary of the Ming dynasty, which the Yongle Encyclopedia used as the basis for its organizational structure.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代文学家，曾任职于教育部，并提议将《永乐大典》残本交由京师图书馆收藏以加强保护。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer who, while working for the Ministry of Education, proposed transferring the remaining volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia to the Capital Library for better preservation.

description.zh-cn: 清末大臣，在1909年清点翰林院藏书后，将仅存的64册《永乐大典》运回家中私藏。
description.en: A late Qing minister who, after an inventory in 1909, moved the last 64 volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia from the Hanlin Academy to his private residence.

description.zh-cn: 现今收藏《永乐大典》副本最多的机构。
description.en: The institution that currently holds the largest collection of the Yongle Encyclopedia's duplicate manuscript.

description.zh-cn: 下谕令解缙等人编修类书，即《永乐大典》的前身《文献大成》，并在重修完成后定名为《永乐大典》。
description.en: Issued an edict ordering Xie Jin and others to compile a leishu, which was the predecessor of the Yongle Encyclopedia named 'Wenxian Dacheng'. After its revision, he named it the 'Yongle Encyclopedia'.

description.zh-cn: 受明成祖之命主编《永乐大典》（初名《文献大成》）。
description.en: Was ordered by the Yongle Emperor to serve as the chief editor of the Yongle Encyclopedia (originally named 'Wenxian Dacheng').

description.zh-cn: 在《文献大成》因不完善而重修时，被明成祖任命为监修。
description.en: When 'Wenxian Dacheng' was being revised due to incompleteness, he was appointed as a supervisor by the Yongle Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 在《文献大成》因不完善而重修时，与姚广孝一同被明成祖任命为监修。
description.en: Was appointed as a supervisor by the Yongle Emperor, along with Yao Guangxiao, during the revision of 'Wenxian Dacheng'.

description.zh-cn: 向明太祖朱元璋提议编写一部类书典籍，但此事后遭搁置。
description.en: Proposed the compilation of a comprehensive leishu to Emperor Hongwu (Zhu Yuanzhang), but the matter was shelved.

description.zh-cn: 非常喜爱《永乐大典》，为避免其因火灾等意外而亡佚，于嘉靖四十一年（1562年）下令重录一部副本。
description.en: Greatly admired the Yongle Encyclopedia and, to prevent its loss from fire or other accidents, ordered the creation of a duplicate manuscript copy in 1562.

description.zh-cn: 被明世宗朱厚熜任命为《永乐大典》重录工作的总校官。
description.en: Was appointed by the Jiajing Emperor (Zhu Houcong) as a general proofreader for the project to create a duplicate copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 被明世宗朱厚熜任命为《永乐大典》重录工作的总校官。
description.en: Was appointed by the Jiajing Emperor (Zhu Houcong) as a general proofreader for the project to create a duplicate copy of the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 据郭沫若、张升等人推测，《永乐大典》正本可能在明末李自成入京时被其农民军焚毁。
description.en: According to scholars like Guo Moruo and Zhang Sheng, the original manuscript of the Yongle Encyclopedia may have been destroyed by Li Zicheng's peasant army when they entered Beijing at the end of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在焚烧翰林院时，导致一部分《永乐大典》被焚毁、弃置或被外国人盗走。
description.en: When they set fire to the Hanlin Academy, they caused a portion of the Yongle Encyclopedia to be burned, abandoned, or stolen by foreigners.

description.zh-cn: 在光绪十一年至十三年间从翰林院盗走至少百余册《永乐大典》副本，加剧了其散佚。
description.en: Between 1885 and 1887, he stole at least a hundred volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia's duplicate manuscript from the Hanlin Academy, accelerating its dispersal and loss.

description.zh-cn: 四库馆馆臣从《永乐大典》中辑佚了大量散佚古籍，如《旧五代史》等，这些辑佚成果成为《四库全书》的重要组成部分。
description.en: Scholars of the Siku Quanshu project recovered a large number of lost ancient books, such as the 'Old History of the Five Dynasties', from the Yongle Encyclopedia, and these recovered texts became an important part of the Siku Quanshu.

description.zh-cn: 下令开设四库全书馆，编纂《四库全书》，并批准了从《永乐大典》中辑佚的方案。
description.en: Ordered the establishment of the Siku Quanshu project, the compilation of the Siku Quanshu, and approved the plan to recover lost texts from the Yongle Encyclopedia.

description.zh-cn: 上《谨陈管见开馆校书折子》，提议从《永乐大典》中辑佚以充实《四库全书》，此建议被采纳。
description.en: Submitted a memorial proposing the recovery of lost texts from the Yongle Encyclopedia to enrich the Siku Quanshu, a suggestion that was adopted.

description.zh-cn: 《永乐大典》以《洪武正韵》作为编排韵目，以韵统字，用字系事。
description.en: The Yongle Encyclopedia used the 'Hongwu Zhengyun' as its organizational framework, arranging entries by rime, with characters under their respective rimes.

description.zh-cn: 将翰林院清点后仅存的64册《永乐大典》运回家中私藏，使其脱离官方保管。
description.en: Moved the last remaining 64 volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia from the Hanlin Academy to his private residence after an inventory, removing them from official custody.

description.zh-cn: 在教育部任职时，提议将陆润庠私藏的翰林院《大典》残本交由京师图书馆收藏保管，促进了其保护。
description.en: While working at the Ministry of Education, he proposed that the remaining volumes of the Yongle Encyclopedia from the Hanlin Academy, then privately held by Lu Runxiang, be transferred to the Capital Library for safekeeping, thus promoting their preservation.
